result.execSummary:
The defendant Brent K. Bowers was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC [Modifiers: Repeater], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia [Modifiers: Repeater], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Taylor County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Defendant shall submit to a DNA sample at the Taylor County Sheriff's Department.  Defendant shall pay the fine and costs at the rate of $100.00 a month beginning June 1, 2016.

The jail sentence shall begin no later than June 25, 2016 at 4:30 pm.  The jail sentence may be served with huber and good time.    The defendant shall pay all sheriff and jail fees or costs allowed or imposed by law and the sheriff shall be entitled to a judgment against the defendant for any such unpaid fees or costs.  

Jail can be served in any county in the State of Wisconsin provided arrangements are made by counsel or the defendant, it is approved by the Taylor County Jail, and at no additional cost to Taylor County.

Final Notice
In Court Notice to Defendant After Sentencing
Request for Payment Plan, Agreement to Make Payments, and Order

Defendant Brent K. Bowers in court with attorney Wright C. Laufenberg.  Kristi S. Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea agreement put into the record.  Attorney  Tlusty moves to amend count 1 to misd possession of THC with repeater enhancement.  Defendant enters a plea of no contest to amended charge count 1 and no contest to count 2.  Plea colloquy.  Plea freely, voluntarily and intelligently; factual basis exists.  Court finds defendant guilty.  Court orders on count 1 - $100.00 fine plus costs, DNA sample and surcharge; 20 days county jail with huber and good time to begin no later than June 25, 2016 at 4:30 pm.    Count 2 - court orders  $100.00 fine plus costs and DNA sample.  The fine and costs shall be paid at the rate of $100.00 a month beginning June 1, 2016. - rt
of Motion Hearing held on March 28, 2016 - Mary P. Bader, RPR
Motion hearing on May 25, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Brent K. Bowers in court with attorney Wright C. Laufenberg.  Kristi S. Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Laufenberg filed motion to suppress.  Officer Horenberger sworn and testified.  Atty Laufenberg makes statement on discovery from TCHS.  State makes statement.  Court directs counsel to subpoena the records and hold a hearing if they won't be released.  Exhibit #1-#4 offered and received.  Atty Laufenberg requests the court to take judicial notice of search warrant filed.  Court grants request. Det. Amus Balsis sworn and testified.   Atty Laufenberg to supplement Exhibit #4.  Argument by State.  Atty Laufenberg requests a continued motion hearing.  Motion hearing scheduled for May 25, 2016 at 01:00 pm. ba

Defendant Brent K. Bowers in court with attorney Wright C. Laufenberg by phone.  Defendant Brent K. Bowers in custody.  Kristi S. Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court quashes the warrant.  Statement by Attorney Laufenberg.  Court questions Brent Bowers regarding why he did not show up for court. His current address is MCT 5, Medford.  Court questions defendant.  Defendant freely and voluntarily waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Court finds probable cause that a crime was committed.  Information filed.  Waive reading of information.  Plea of not guilty to all charges.  Court reinstates previous bond.  Attorney Laufenberg is requesting 10 days to file motions and will obtain court date with judicial assistant.  - rt

Attorney Wright C. Laufenberg in court.  Kristi S. Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  No appearance by the defendant.  It is now 11:22 am.   Statement by Attorney Laufenberg. Court orders a body only warrant.  - rt

ADR began at 1:02 p.m.  Defendant Brent K. Bowers in court.  Kristi S. Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant would like an attorney.  He filed a petition for appointment of counsel.  Bond continued.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 22, 2015 at 01:00 pm. ADR ended at 1:04 p.m.
of Detective Aemus M. Balsis in support of application for search warrant

Defendant shall not leave the State of Wisconsin without prior notice to and written approval of the court. Defendant shall comply with booking procedures at the Taylor County Sheriff's Department. Defendant shall not possess or consume any controlled substances without a valid prescription.
Initial Appearance on August 11, 2015 at 1:00 p.m.
Arrest Report

Attorney Kristi Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin by phone.  Brent K. Bowers appeared in person, in custody.  Court finds probable cause for arrest without warrant based on the arrest header.  Attorney Tlusty requests a $2,000.00 signature bond; booking; no possession or consumption of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.  Court orders bond as requested by Attorney Tlusty.  The next court date is an initial appearance scheduled for August 11, 2015 at 1:00 p.m.  - rt
